name: com.achioto.gamespace-pcg
description:
Gamespace generation using a gamespace graph.

!! Required dependencies: !!
- https://github.com/neuecc/UniRx.git?path=Assets/Plugins/UniRx/Scripts
- https://github.com/AchimBunke/Unity_CustomUtilities.git
- https://github.com/applejag/Newtonsoft.Json-for-Unity.Converters.git#1.6.3


Gamespace graph as a design tool to shape properties of levels.
PCG tools that uses gamespace graph data to generate PCG configurations and content.

Import Samples for tutorials.

samples.description: Demo and tutorial scenes that demostrate the gamespace graph and PCG generation techniques implemented in this project.
